items.author: Michael Crichton, David Koepp
items.plot: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
items.stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
items.title: Jurassic Park

items.author: Robert Rodat
items.plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
items.stars: Tom Hanks, Matt Damon, Tom Sizemore
items.title: Saving Private Ryan

items.author: David Franzoni, John Logan, William Nicholson
items.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
items.stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen
items.title: Gladiator

items.author: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr., Peter Craig
items.plot: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.
items.stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller
items.title: Top Gun: Maverick

items.author: Nicolas Boukhrief
items.plot: A mysteriously stoic character is hired as a security guard by a cash truck company responsible for transporting a lot of money around Los Angeles each week.
items.stars: Jason Statham, Holt MacCallany and Josh Hartnett
items.title: Wrath of Man
